alert.note: Alert for Sibley (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 7:44PM CDT until April 12 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SIBLEY COUNTY... At 743 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gibbon, or 16 miles north of New Ulm, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported quarter size hail with this storm. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Sibley County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
